item.title: By: Hyd
item.dc:creator: Hyd
item.description:
Welcome back.
I was one of the victims of the crash, took them about three hours to get our server back on it's feet.
Last time I visited my hometown, I got hit up by a bum who just said, "I need some money for beer." I gave him a buck - at least he was honest.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome back.

I was one of the victims of the crash, took them about three hours to get our server back on it’s feet.

Last time I visited my hometown, I got hit up by a bum who just said, “I need some money for beer.” I gave him a buck – at least he was honest.

item.title: By: Windjammer
item.dc:creator: Windjammer
item.description: Welcome back! Warcrap has been usual...much more kids, much more crap in Gen Chat.
item.content:encoded: Welcome back! Warcrap has been usual…much more kids, much more crap in Gen Chat.

item.title: By: Krones
item.dc:creator: Krones
item.description: Afk blogger, I have reblogged while you were away, you were sorely missed sir, please have my afk babies.
item.content:encoded: Afk blogger, I have reblogged while you were away, you were sorely missed sir, please have my afk babies.

item.title: By: tratch
item.dc:creator: tratch
item.description: Hey, welcome back man. In my head the pants-free bum was singing "The Old Grey Mare", but that may only be because I've been watching too much Simpsons.
item.content:encoded: Hey, welcome back man. In my head the pants-free bum was singing “The Old Grey Mare”, but that may only be because I’ve been watching too much Simpsons.

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description: Good to see you back, too. I thought maybe you went AFK-4E (For Evah).
item.content:encoded: Good to see you back, too. I thought maybe you went AFK-4E (For Evah).
